item.title: Added PageShare.dev
item.description: https://www.pageshare.dev - Adds visual reviews capabilities into GitHub Pull Requests with no need to deploy websites. Free for up to 10 pages each month and 100MB of storage in total.

item.title: feat: add mail.gw
item.description: https://mail.gw - 10 Minute Mail. Free anonymous temporary email without obligations.

item.title: add supportivekoala
item.description: http://supportivekoala.com/ - Allows you to autogenerate images by your input via templates. Free plan allows you to create up to 100 images per week.

item.title: add visualime.com
item.description: https://www.visualime.com/ - Free and unlimited session recordings, no traffic limits

item.title: Update free plans offered by session recording tools
item.description:
https://www.inspectlet.com/ - 2,500 sessions/month free for 1 website
https://livesession.io/ - 5,000 sessions/month free for 1 website
https://mouseflow.com/ - 500 sessions/month free for 1 website

item.title: Add HostedScan to Security and PKI
item.description: https://hostedscan.com - Online vulnerability scanner for web applications, servers, and networks. 10 free scans per month.

item.title: Remove ending whitespace
item.description:
https://www.gooddata.com/ - Data as a Service - Create interactive and insightful dashboards. Free tier comes with 5 workspaces and 100 MB/workspace.
https://meetslack.com - Slack](https://meetslack.com) - Start Google Meetings directly from Slack by using /meet in any channel, group or DM. Free without any limitations.
https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com - A Dashboard for publishing automated test results and a Framework for implementing manual tests as code using GitHub. The service is [free for Open Source](https://github.com/marketplace/testspace-com) accounts for 450 results per month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://heyform.net/ - Drag and drop online form builder. Free tier lets you create unlimited forms and collect unlimited submissions. Comes with pre-built templates, anti-spam, and 100MB file storage.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://www.gradientos.app - Makes choosing a gradient fast and easy.
